dialogData.line: You'll get it. Eventually. Probably not, though.

replies.line: You'll get my hand in your face if you don't quit it!
And you'll never get anything from anyone, so how's that?

dialogData.line: Bet you wish you had listened to me, now.

replies.line: No one in their right mind would ever listen to you.
I wish I could punch your lights out!
You'll look worse when I get my hands on you!
No more pathetic than your entire existence.

dialogData.line: You only got that far through luck.

replies.line: If I was lucky, I'd never have met you.
Keep that up and not even luck will save you!
No, I did it by myself.

dialogData.line: I wouldn't have done that if I were you.

replies.line: And if I were you, I would throw myself off that cliff.
Can it before I make you!
